title: daily living schema
description: Schema to describe the details needed for daily living section within the the pip-apply application

preparingFood.description: Supports the provision of details for the preparing food section of a PIP2 claim

preparingFoodDescription.description: Free text to hold details entered by a claimant about any difficulties they have with preparing food.
examples: All of the details the claimant wants to enter about their difficulties preparing food.

useFeedingTube.description: indicates whether a claimant uses a feeding tube or similar device to eat or drink.

eatingDrinkingDescription.description: Free text to hold details entered by a claimant about any difficulties they have with eating and drinking.
